title: Revealing Rexa
description: Miyam was a psychic spy, training to be a member of an elite society known only as the revealers. But that was years ago, before her mother died and her father removed her from her home.Now, her mundane new life is thrown into turmoil when her father is murdered. Looking for a new start, Miyam joins a dangerous quest to find the long lost kingâ€™s talisman, and her fate becomes entwined with the revealers once again.A terrifying invader travels by night, burning everything in its path. A small group of friends strive to save the queen and defeat the enemy. And Miyam begins a personal journey to reconcile her shattered life and rediscover her lost destiny.
author: Ella Stradling
